title: 《算法基础》学习笔记-排序算法测试源代码
content:
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<ctime>
#include<vector>

#define INF 0x7FFFFFFF

using namespace std;

int RandomPartition(int* A, int p, int r) {
	int a = (rand() % (r - p)) + p;
	int temp = A[r];
	A[r] = A[a];
	A[a] = temp;
	int q = p;
	for (int u = p; u < r; u++) {
		if (A[u] <= A[r]) {
			int temp = A[u];
			A[u] = A[q];
			A[q] = temp;
			q++;
		}
	}
	temp = A[r];
	A[r] = A[q];
	A[q] = temp;
	return q;
}

void RandomQuickSort(int* A, int p, int r) {
	if (p < r) {
		int q = RandomPartition(A, p, r);
		RandomQuickSort(A, p, q - 1);
		RandomQuickSort(A, q + 1, r);
	}
}

void SelectionSort(int* A, int n) {
	for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
		int min = A[i], minindex = i;
		for (int j = i + 1; j < n; j++) {
			if (A[j] < min) {
				min = A[j];
				minindex = j;
			}
		}
		int temp = A[i];
		A[i] = A[minindex];
		A[minindex] = temp;
	}
}

void InsertionSort(int* A, int n) {
	for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) {
		int key = A[i], j = i - 1;
		while (j >= 0 && A[j] > key) {
			A[j + 1] = A[j];
			j--;
		}
		A[j + 1] = key;
	}
}

void Merge(int* A, int p, int q, int r) {
	int n1 = q - p + 1, n2 = r - q, i = 0, j = 0;
	int* B = new int[n1 + 1];
	int* C = new int[n2 + 1];
	B[n1] = INF;
	C[n2] = INF;
	for (int i = 0; i < n1; i++) B[i] = A[p + i];
	for (int i = 0; i < n2; i++) C[i] = A[q + i + 1];
	for (int k = p; k <= r; k++) {
		if (B[i] <= C[j]) {
			A[k] = B[i];
			i++;
		}
		else {
			A[k] = C[j];
			j++;
		}
	}
	delete[] B;
	delete[] C;
}

void MergeSort(int* A, int p, int r) {
	if (p < r) {
		int q = (p + r) / 2;
		MergeSort(A, p, q);
		MergeSort(A, q + 1, r);
		Merge(A, p, q, r);
	}
}

int Partition(int* A, int p, int r) {
	int q = p;
	for (int u = p; u < r; u++) {
		if (A[u] <= A[r]) {
			int temp = A[u];
			A[u] = A[q];
			A[q] = temp;
			q++;
		}
	}
	int temp = A[r];
	A[r] = A[q];
	A[q] = temp;
	return q;
}

void QuickSort(int* A, int p, int r) {
	if (p < r) {
		int q = Partition(A, p, r);
		QuickSort(A, p, q - 1);
		QuickSort(A, q + 1, r);
	}
}

int main(int argc, char** argv) {
	int n = 0, lt = 0;
	clock_t start, end;
	double temptime = 0.0, sum = 0.0;
	double sorttime[5] = { 0.0 };
	vector<double> tempsorttime;

	cout << "Enter the Input data scale : ";
	cin >> n;
	cout << "Enter the Loop time : ";
	cin >> lt;

	int* A = new int[n];

	tempsorttime.clear();
	for (int i = 0; i < lt; i++) {
		srand((int)time(NULL));
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)	A[i] = rand();

		start = clock();
		InsertionSort(A, n);
		end = clock();
		temptime = (double)(end - start);
		tempsorttime.push_back(temptime);
		cout << "Insertion Sort time : " << temptime << "ms" << endl;
	}
	sum = 0.0;
	for (auto i : tempsorttime) {
		sum += i;
	}
	sorttime[0] = (double)sum / lt;

	tempsorttime.clear();
	for (int i = 0; i < lt; i++) {
		srand((int)time(NULL));
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)	A[i] = rand();

		start = clock();
		SelectionSort(A, n);
		end = clock();
		temptime = (double)(end - start);
		tempsorttime.push_back(temptime);
		cout << "Selection Sort time : " << temptime << "ms" << endl;
	}
	sum = 0.0;
	for (auto i : tempsorttime) {
		sum += i;
	}
	sorttime[1] = (double)sum / lt;

	tempsorttime.clear();
	for (int i = 0; i < lt; i++) {
		srand((int)time(NULL));
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)	A[i] = rand();

		start = clock();
		MergeSort(A, 0, n - 1);
		end = clock();
		temptime = (double)(end - start);
		tempsorttime.push_back(temptime);
		cout << "Merge Sort time : " << temptime << "ms" << endl;
	}
	sum = 0.0;
	for (auto i : tempsorttime) {
		sum += i;
	}
	sorttime[2] = (double)sum / lt;

	tempsorttime.clear();
	for (int i = 0; i < lt; i++) {
		srand((int)time(NULL));
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)	A[i] = rand();

		start = clock();
		QuickSort(A, 0, n - 1);
		end = clock();
		temptime = (double)(end - start);
		tempsorttime.push_back(temptime);
		cout << "Quick Sort time : " << temptime << "ms" << endl;
	}
	sum = 0.0;
	for (auto i : tempsorttime) {
		sum += i;
	}
	sorttime[3] = (double)sum / lt;

	tempsorttime.clear();
	for (int i = 0; i < lt; i++) {
		srand((int)time(NULL));
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)	A[i] = rand();

		start = clock();
		RandomQuickSort(A, 0, n - 1);
		end = clock();
		temptime = (double)(end - start);
		tempsorttime.push_back(temptime);
		cout << "Randomized Quick Sort time : " << temptime << "ms" << endl;
	}
	sum = 0.0;
	for (auto i : tempsorttime) {
		sum += i;
	}
	sorttime[4] = (double)sum / lt;

	cout << endl << "Final time:" << endl;
	cout << "Insertion Sort : " << sorttime[0] << "ms" << endl;
	cout << "Selection Sort : " << sorttime[1] << "ms" << endl;
	cout << "Merge Sort : " << sorttime[2] << "ms" << endl;
	cout << "Quick Sort : " << sorttime[3] << "ms" << endl;
	cout << "Randomized Quick Sort : " << sorttime[4] << "ms" << endl;

	delete[] A;
	A = NULL;
	system("pause");
	return 0;
}
